content: अध्यारूढ {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Mounted, ascended. {@--2@} Raised above, elevated. {@--3@} Above, superior to, more than (with <ab>instr.</ab>); below, inferior; ततोऽ ध्यारूढानां पदमसुजनद्वेषजननं <ls>Mu. 5. 12</ls> of those in high office; आयुधपरिग्रहं यावदध्यारूढो दुर्योगः <ls>U. 6</ls> my insolence went the length of taking up arms.
